steps.conclusion: Titles are not in English despite APP_LANGUAGE being English and the expectation that all titles be in English. This violates a core rule. Other key constraints (single-topic titles, <=5 words, no levels, inclusion of the exact topic Black Holes, is_language_course=false, tabler icon prefix) are met.

Change titles to English: use "Black Holes", "Astrophysics", and "Cosmology" as the title values (keeping english_title identical to the titles in this case). Ensure all visible fields follow the APP_LANGUAGE setting.
